page.title: 02ODIHAM A RESIDENTIAL AREA
page.content: In and around Odiham, the Alder Valley bus service provides transport to Farnham and Basingstoke via Hook. The nearest railway station is at Hook, one and a half miles away. Two private housing estates have been developed in the last six years. Many of the houses in the Odiham area are privately owned. Married quarters at R.A.F Odiham provide accomodation for service personnel at the station. There are two housing estates, owned by the Hart District Council in the area. Three schools, an Infant, a Junior and a Secondary-comprehensive, provide for the educational needs of children up to the age of sixteen. Further education is provided in Basingstoke colleges. Evening classes for adults are held in the Junior and Secondary schools in the area.
